mapper.insert: insert into noticeBoard (uId, uName, subject, content, pos, ref, depth, regTM, ip, readCnt, fileName, fileSize) values (#{uId}, #{uName}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, #{ref}, 0, now(), #{ip}, 0, #{fileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select:
select * from noticeBoard
where ${keyField } like '%${keyWord}%'
order by ref desc, pos asc
mapper.insert: insert into noticeReply (uId, uName, content, pos, ref, depth, regTM, ip ) values (#{uId}, #{uName}, #{content}, 0, #{ref}, 0, now(), #{ip})
